message.text: Basic Combat Skills Tutorial of Fighter
ファイターの基本戦術を学ぶため 修練の祠にて試練に挑む
Talk to the White Knight near the cliff of the Training Chapel.
Talk to Wilson in the Training Chapel.
Attack the enemy continuously with your normal attack.
Break the enemy’s guard stance with your charged attack.
Guard and block when the enemy attacks.
Defeat the remaining Goblins in the inner sanctum.
Collect the Emblem proving you completed the challenge.
Report back to Renton in the White Dragon Temple.
